TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr F. Gümüş , a lawyer practising in GPE .

On DATE the applicant , along with some other intellectuals , artists and representatives of non - governmental organisations , totalling CARDINAL persons , gathered together outside the ORG building in GPE , where a representative read a declaration entitled “ To ORG and all other international organisations ” and distributed copies of it to members of the press .
On DATE , the public prosecutor filed a bill of indictment with ORG against the applicant and CARDINAL other co - defendants , who signed the declaration .

During the criminal proceedings before ORG , the court had obtained some of the defendants ' statements before it , for the others it issued rogatory letters addressing the local courts , as the accused persons were living outside the territory of GPE , in CARDINAL different cities of the Country , namely , GPE , GPE , GPE , GPE , ORG , Batman , Gaziantep , ORG , GPE , PERSON , Silopi , PERSON , GPE and GPE .

The court took note of the statements that were sent back at each hearing . It also issued arrest warrants for the defendants that could not be found merely for the purpose of obtaining their statements .
The case file does not disclose any information as to whether the applicant or his lawyer requested from the court that the applicant 's case proceed separately from the others .

On DATE before delivering its first decision , the court separated the CARDINAL defendants ' cases from the main case as they still could not be found , and sentenced the applicant and some of his co - accused to DATE imprisonment each and a fine of MONEY for disseminating propaganda against the territorial integrity of the ORG and the indivisible unity of the nation pursuant to section CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) of the Prevention of Terrorism Act ( Law no . ORG ) .
On DATE the applicant appealed to ORG .
On DATE ORG quashed the judgment on account of the lack of notification papers in the case file , and sent it back to the first instance court .
On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of the offence as charged , and suspended the execution of the sentence in accordance with LAW no . DATE . The applicant appealed .
On DATE ORG quashed ORG judgment on the grounds that the criminal proceedings against the applicant should be discontinued since the prosecution was time - barred .
On DATE ORG adhered to the judgment of ORG and decided that the case be struck off from its list .
